writings.text: 将を射んと欲すれば先ず馬を射よ

readings.text: しょうをいんとほっすればまずうまをいよ

furigana.writing: 将を射んと欲すれば先ず馬を射よ
furigana.reading: しょうをいんとほっすればまずうまをいよ

glossary: do not shoot straight for the top
he that would the daughter win, must with the mother first begin
if you want to shoot the general, first shoot his horse
